creator: philippe.lavoie@cactus.ca
text:
Using fop-0.18.1-dev.src

Do the following:
  - cd docs/examples
  - ./runtests.sh
  - cd tests
  - acroread table.pdf

The output is not the same as the one from 0.17:
  - text is inside borders (page 2)
  - background colors are missing in some of the tables (page 2)
  - etc.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Text positioning and background color work in 0.20.3
I'm somewhat worried about the etc. bit, though.
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
